item.title: MAHA Is a Bad Answer to a Good Question
item.description: Rachael Bedard and David Wallace-Wells on Covid disillusionment and the rise of the MAHA movement.

item.title: Offered a cash price for a prenatal genetic test? It may be your best bet
item.description: An expectant mom got a $750 bill for a blood test to check for genetic abnormalities in her baby. Then she tried to figure out why it was so high.

item.title: These programs help poor students with college. Trump wants to pull the funding
item.description: For 60 years, TRIO has helped millions of people along the path to a degree, but the administration says it is no longer needed.

item.title: Thaksin Shinawatra, Former Thai Premier, Cleared of Insulting Monarchy
item.description: But the reprieve for Thaksin Shinawatra, who remains a political force, did not mean that the legal troubles for him and his family were over.

item.title: Israel Is Expanding Its Gaza City Operation, but Where Does It Stand?
item.description: The Israeli government is widening its operation in Gaza despite its generals’ advice and as it deliberates on a new cease-fire proposal.

item.title: The Hobbyist Restorer Who Rocked the Art World With an A.I. Innovation
